desc: 데미지를 입었을 때 확률로 데미지 25% 회복

dictionary.lore: A helmet said to have been forged from an ancient comet. It is said that this helmet has a mysterious power which allows it to turn back time when the wearer is attacked, making it seem like the assault never happened. According to contemporary research, the veracity of this ability is disputed. However, many legends tell of numerous heroes who wore this helmet and escaped death thanks to it.

name: 혜성투구 클로에 사쿠리스
